Liking this. Their relationship became more of equal and both enjoys the sex together; not just him forcing it on her, but she's also in position to ask it from him. Besides, in the end they agree on a longer relationship. Seems to be a lot of distrust on her in the comments isn't it, like calling her gold digger. Don't think she cared or got that much plan, as she doesn't care about his parent's money. What she wants from him would be something more emotional, to experience that Takumi is working and caring for her and their child as a husband. | A mystery... why does the sex talk in ero manga always felt more cringe when translated? ^^; In the raw version, the dialogues felt like it has a more natural flow.

I don't understand why she hasn't broke up with the boyfriend, like she already told the other one that she loves him and told him to be responsable if she gets pregnant and marry her, it's pointless to drag around the boyfriend ¯\_(ツ)_/¯

Hmmm, I know I said I found the artist wanting to make an quote "Original" piece funny, but perhaps there is a bit of something that's not of the Usual NTR formula in this work.  Seems like the FMC is trying to have the chad take responsibility for her and maybe even baby-trap him in the end since he's loaded and she can dig gold of him. (Something the FMC usually does to the BF in NTRs)   She's going as far as to collect video evidence of her's and the chad's sexual affair while making sure there is nothing that might get the BF in trouble.  As well as making sure to only have protected sex with BF while doing it raw with the chad.  Would be nice if the end game does a good switch-a-roo with the chad taking responsibility and the BF down to side-piece ( But one that does occasionally get to have sex with the FMC)  but hey, it's still an NTR and there's still a formula that needs to be followed.

This shit is so predictable at this point.
My bet is she's gonna use the videos to turn the boyfriend into a cuckhold that likes seeing his GF be embraced by another man...like 9000 other NTR doujins at this point.

@shhhshs Had to give some backdrop for him getting to fuck her I guess. I can guess by the panels where it shows them having "pretend sex" as she calls it that she's gonna get off on exposing herself to her boyfriend in part 3.

Soo... She turned into a gold digger..? Well not really since she'll wait for him to produce money by himself... But doesn't want to wait for her bf? So... She's just madly in love... For... some.... reason? Even the guy didn't expect her to actually fell for him. What even is this shit? Not to mention the last narration by the MC made it much worse. What? So we won't have to feel bad for the MC or something?? Anyhow, yep, this is just basically sex and money, easy housewife life. Sheesh, they're not even graduating yet. Oh well, cash will easily fix that anyway, right? Man...

"How much dialogue do you want?"

Author: Yes

I will admit. With good art and an NTR, I thought it would be in the popular section...... Oh well looks like this aint strong enough to kick out the Vanillas in the PS, looks like Arakure failed too. Not that Im comparing I love both Vanilla and NTR, its just unusual for me that an NTR doujin with a good art didnt reach the popular section

At this point, from that last page, FMC could pull off something VERY INTERESTING: ok so the current state is that she is having a lot of sex with douche BUT she also requested videos (ding ding!) from him when he lowered his guard... SPICYYYYYY. So here I'm hoping (even though we know chances are... pretty slim) that we get some type of *coughs* ⓡⓔⓥⓔⓝⓖⓔ *coughs* or some dirty and/or sinister plot *grins evilly*... I love the art, I love 'em THICC and JUICY. Good shit. Hope there is part 3, let's 🅵🆄🅲🅺🅸🅽🅶 🅶🅾🅾🅾🅾🅾🅾
